full_text: I just got a new therapist because of all of the ableist bullying and cyberbullying I faced the past few years

I have a friend named Mackenzie who does NOT understand why I am broken and I would really like to help her understand. She also doesn't know Themed Learning Club's history and doesn't know she's being silenced by Liz. Poor kid.
And they like to silence anyone who is about to expose them if they're secretly being abused by them. https://t.co/Id1pan1wCR

This is your reminder to be careful about which YouTube user you idolize. They could be secretly narcissistic about gaining more subscribers or themselves as a person, bullying other people to gain power. 

They could also be pedos.
